tasks.task: Attend a week-long comprehensive farmer field school facilitator training.
subtasks: Gather with Extension officers from across the Caribbean region.
Explore topics such as the purpose of farmer field schools.
Learn strategies for planning and community engagement.
Familiarize with the updated Farmer Field School Manual.
Share knowledge on the responsible use of pesticides.
Develop skills in delivering effective farmer field school programs.
Support farmers in adopting sustainable agricultural practices.
Understand the importance of agroecological system preservation.
Contribute to the agricultural sector's development and food security.

tasks.task: Update the St. Lucia's Farmer Field School Manual.
subtasks: Revise the existing manual originally from 2006.
Publish the updated manual as an official FAO publication.
Support the delivery of farmer field schools focusing on pesticide reduction.
Participate in delivering farmer field schools after the training.
Focus on reducing the use of highly hazardous pesticides.
Report on the training event (done by Anissia Antoine).
Highlight the collaboration between Ministry of Agriculture and ACP MEA's three project.
Promote the importance of equipped sectoral leaders in addressing farming challenges.
